evidence.claim: Nephrology Practice Solutions emphasizes compliance with HIPAA for patient data management.
The use of FHIR standards is mentioned in their patient data exchange protocols.
HL7 standards are utilized in data exchange between systems in nephrology.
The company has a strong focus on integrating EHRs for nephrology practices.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found on the site.
